Project Description
An entertaining game written for Silverlight 1.1 / 2.0. Click sets of adjacent gems that share the same color and see how high you can score.


Gem Blaster was written in late summer / fall of 2007, and currently runs on the Silverlight 1.1 Alpha runtime.

It will be updated to support Silverlight 2.0 shortly after the new bits are made available by Microsoft.



Instructions

Not much to it. Find like-colored gems that are adjacent to each other, and click them to score points. Larger combinations will yield large points bonuses. If you clear a whole column, then the neighboring columns will slide over and make room for more. If you get into trouble, you can use up to five "hints" and five "cheats".

For more instructions, click the "Learn How to Play" button in the startup screen.
